Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory8.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: "I know we're supposed to decorate the venue, but we really can't be wasting resources, so we can only do something simple.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I think this is more than good enough!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I think so too.', 3: '8', 4: 'Thanks for your work.', 5: '10'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: 'As long as you guys are happy.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: "Don't mention it. We wanted to do it ourselves.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Everyone's almost here. Let's begin the ceremony, Lee.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Sure. We're only playing the second part of the recording anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We'll start playing at this timestamp...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Edward', 3: 'Thank you, whoever you are in the future.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: 'Is it starting?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, it's about to start!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's grab a good seat.", 3: '24', 4: "I don't think I do very well in this kind of function.", 5: '25'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm a little nervous too... but we'll be fine if we stick together!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Edward', 3: 'Before our wedding begins, the two of us have something we want to tell you.'}
{2: 'Julie', 3: "Although you might have guessed it already, we still want to tell you, you generous soul... I'm afraid we've long passed at this point."}
{2: 'Edward', 3: 'After the virus broke out, neither of us could board Babylonia, nor did we have the strength to run away.'}
{2: 'Julie', 3: "But even as the world became more and more unfamiliar, we were still holding each other's hand, bathing in this overwhelming love."}
{2: 'Edward', 3: "We're leaving this recording behind in this church, not because we want to have a wedding or have you host a celebration for us..."}
{2: 'Edward', 3: "But in hopes that someone out there will know we've loved each other."}
{2: 'Edward', 3: 'I love you, Julie.'}
{2: 'Julie', 3: 'I love you too, Edward.'}
{2: 'Edward', 3: "If you ever fall in love the way we do, you from the future... we'll be praying for you."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, I think... I really like my new frame.', 4: '1'}
